body: At 12th level, the spirit ranger can use his augury spell-like ability even when he is not in one of his favored terrains. If he is within one of his favored terrains, the ranger can cast divination instead. Like augury, the caster level of the divination is equal to the ranger's level. This ability replaces camouflage.
name: Wisdom of the Spirits
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Ranger/Ranger Archetypes/Spirit Ranger/Wisdom of the Spirits
